reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Dimmer Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D26HD-1RW, White
reviews.text: I just installed the Leviton WiFi dimmer. The installation is easy but you need to identify the black wire that carries the power. You can see how to do this on the listing's video. The WiFi set up was a little messy but once it was done, by first linking to the "My Leviton" google app, then the " Amazon Alexa Home" app, the Alexa voice command works great. This is only the second day with the switch so I don't have any long-term report. I have other Leviton light switches and they are top quality compared to others. I expect the same for this one.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2025
reviews.title: Leviton WiFi Dimmer - quality product

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Dimmer Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D26HD-1RW, White
reviews.text: Love these switches. Replaced all switches in home remodeling and used these in select locations. Easy to install if you have any electrical background. You must hook up the neutral wire for these to work correctly. Pre wired with color coded wiring. Easy to connect with the internet and no hub required. The app seems to work flawlessly for me. Very Happy with the Leviton Products. Also if you want screwless wall plates only use the leviton brand, I tried using cheaper ones and they wouldn't sit flush with the wall.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2025
reviews.title: Leviton is #1

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Dimmer Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D26HD-1RW, White

reviews.title: Gen 2 is great

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Dimmer Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D26HD-1RW, White
reviews.text: It was simple to wire. Do make sure you have neutral in the box before buying! Recommend down loading the Leviton App ASAP so you can get into the Matter upgrade program. The firmware in the switches currently shipping don't support Matter. Once you have the switch up on your home network (following Leviton directions) go to device settings and Check for Firmware Update Current version supporting Matter is 2.1.25. Once upgraded a new menu item "Matter Pairing Code" will appear. Click this and write down the 11-digit code. The go to the switch and hold the top paddle for 7 seconds to put the switch in Pairing Mode (flashing green led). Go to your hub controller and add the new Matter device using the require procedure for your hub and the 11-digit Matter Pairing code. Let me add that I contacted the Leviton support, and they did their best to support me. Now that I know the process I may buy this switch again - but first it has to pass my break in and reliability tests.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to wire - Matter readiness requires firmware update

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Dimmer Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D26HD-1RW, White
reviews.text: I'm trying to automate the house as much as I can. We have a need to be able to control some things like lighting via automation to alert a deaf person for things like when it's time to get up. This product with the app support allows you to create schedules and control the lighting. Control via third party apps like Siri and Alexa is also supported. I wish it was possible to directly automate from things like fire alarms but you can utilize these third party tools to 'cobble' something together. I requested direct support for a fire alarms feature from the manufacture but they have not committed to it. When I did have trouble with one of the devices the email support was top notch. We were able to resolve the issue quickly in just a few email exchanges.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
reviews.title: Automated light control works without needing special hub

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Dimmer Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D26HD-1RW, White
reviews.text: We’ve tried multiple smart switches for our home. Leviton were the most straightforward to install, practically did the connection to the MyLeviton app completely on its own, and they work flawlessly. Seriously worth the extra cost. The less expensive brands took forever to synch and were fussy. I love these. Great functions, easy to program, well built. They also come with an ivory switch that you can change out so you can install it as ivory or white. So awesome!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024
reviews.title: Best smart switch so far

reviews.text: Who needs a Wi-Fi wall switch?! We do!! It is so convenient and links to Alexa and the phone app. The contractor added them to a kitchen renovation and we asked for a couple more in two other rooms that have ceiling lights. The dimming transition on both old and new led lamps is very smooth. Save the boxes that have the barcode (for setup purposes) in case you need to add them to a new network or you sell your house.
